name: Easy Post Title Ticker News Box
author: William Stancil

sections.description:
Easy Post Title Ticker News Box plugin is a Responsive jQuery News Ticker Plugin with Bootstrap 3 – Bootstrap News Box for creating a clean responsive post-title-Ticker/slider that allows you to vertically scroll html contents with autoplay and up/down navigation support.

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload Easy-Post-Title-Ticker-News-Box floder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
    3.Use shortcode in page, post or in widgets. short code is [ticker]
    3.If you want Date and Time in your template php file , Place <?php echo do_shortcode('ticker'); ?> in your templates

Shortcodes Is [ticker]
